item.title: Appeal hearing set for property of old Gold's Gym
item.description: A member of the community has come forth to formally appeal the development of the old Gold's Gym location, which helped compliment other nearby business such as Emerald City Smoothie, into a storage facility. The area in question has a moratorium on non-pedestrian oriented businesses, but the permit for the â€¦
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
